contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox lake | lake_name = Lake Zarivar <br />زریوار<br />Zrêbar | image_lake = | caption_lake = | image_bathymetry = | caption_bathymetry = | location = [[Iran]], [[Kurdistan Province, Iran|Kordestan Province]] | coords = {{coord|35|32|N|46|08|E|type:waterbody_region:IR|display=inline,title}} | type = | inflow = | outflow = Zrêbar River | catchment = | basin_countries = Iran | length = 5 km | width = 1.6 km | area = | depth = | max-depth = 6 m | volume = 30.000,000 m³ | residence_time = | shore = | elevation = 1,285 m | islands = | cities = [[Marivan]] }} '''Lake Zarivar''' ({{lang-fa|زریوار}} ''Zarivār''), also known as '''Zeribar''' or '''Zrewar''' ([[Kurdish language|Kurdish]]: ''Zrêwar'' or ''Zrêbar''),({{lang-ku-2|زرێبار}}), is a [[lake]] in western [[Iran]]. ==Etymology== The name is composed of ''zrê'' ("sea") and the suffix -''bar'' (which in [[Kurdish language|Kurdish]] means "lake"). ==Situation== The lake is situated in the Iranian province of [[Kurdistan Province, Iran|Kordestan]] west of [[Marivan]] and has a length of {{convert|5|km|abbr=on}} and a maximum width of {{convert|1.6|km|abbr=on}}. The lake's water is fresh and has a maximum depth of {{convert|6|m|ft}}. Zeribar Lake is a major touristic attraction in the region.<ref Name="SBB/MMN">{{cite web | last =SBB/MMN | first = | authorlink = | coauthors = | title =Cold hits Iran mythological landmark | work =News Article | publisher = [[PressTV]] | date =Jan 11, 2008 | url =http://edition.presstv.ir/detail/38357.html | format =web | doi = | accessdate = September 3, 2010}}</ref> There is a great deal of [[folklore]] about the origins of this lake amongst the Kurdish people of the area. ==Gallery == <center> <gallery> image:AliAfzali1985_ZarivarLake_1.jpg|Lake Zeribar, [[Marivan]] image:AliAfzali1985_ZarivarLake_2.jpg|Lake Zeribar, [[Marivan]] image:AliAfzali1985_ZarivarLake_3.jpg|Lake Zeribar, [[Marivan]] image:AliAfzali1985_ZarivarLake_4.jpg|Lake Zeribar, [[Marivan]] </gallery> </center> {{Panorama |image = File:Zrebar-Panorama.jpg |height = 250 |alt = |caption = Panoramic view from Zrêbar in summer of 2007 }} {{Panorama |image = File:PanoramaFrozenZrebar.jpg |height = 250 |alt = |caption = Panoramic view from totally frozen Zrêbar in winter of 2008 }} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://picasaweb.google.com/aliafzali1985/ZarivarLakeMarivanIran Zarivar Online Photo Galley] [[Category:Lakes of Iran|Zeribar, Lake]] [[Category:Kurdistan Province]] {{Kurdistan Province}} {{KurdistanIran-geo-stub}}
